faq.question: How do I earn commissions?
faq.answer: You will earn a commission every time someone registers through your referral link and makes a payment for our services. Commissions are paid after transactions are verified.

faq.question: When are commissions paid?
faq.answer: Commissions are paid every 20th of each month for all transactions verified the previous month. Minimum withdrawal is IDR 500,000.

faq.question: How long is cookie tracking valid?
faq.answer: Cookie tracking is valid for 30 days from the first click on your referral link. If visitors make a purchase within those 30 days, you still earn commission.
